lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''A War on Poverty Subtly Linked to Race'' (front page, Dec. 26): You say Bill Clinton ''will leave office having helped more Americans escape poverty than any other president since Lyndon B. Johnson.''
abstract: Letter from Howard Slatkin says official figures may seem to describe decline in poverty (Dec 26 article), but they do not account accurately for cost of living, including skyrocketing cost of housing in many urban areas
snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''A War on Poverty Subtly Linked to Race'' (front page, Dec. 26):    You say Bill Clinton ''will leave office having helped more Americans escape poverty than any other president since Lyndon B. Johnson.''...
